title: Customer's response to dynamic pricing in utility energy Tariff quality and reliability with the time of use: An Empirical case study of household electricity customers in Indonesia
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Hari Agung Yuniarto, Nur Mayke Eka Normasari, Irene Clarisa Gunawan, Sella Friscilla Silalahi, Deendarlianto, Indra Ardhanayudha Aditya, Arionmaro Asi Simaremare, Fajar Nurrohman Haryadi
